Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding the palace in Phaltan?
Options:
A. a) The palace was used in a film featuring Akshay Kumar.
B. b) Phaltan is a city in Maharashtra.
C. c) The palace is located in the state of Maharashtra.
D. d) The palace was built in the 19th century.
Answer: a) The palace was used in a film featuring Akshay Kumar. and b) Phaltan is a city in Maharashtra. and c) The palace is located in the state of Maharashtra.
